Deities @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Abraxas]{Abraxas}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Apsu]{Apsu}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Ardad Lili]{Ardad Lili}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Dahak]{Dahak}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Geryon]{Geryon}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Nalinivati]{Nalinivati}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Ragadahn]{Ragadahn}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Sobek]{Sobek}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Zevgavizeb]{Zevgavizeb}

Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Draconic Barrage]{Draconic Barrage}; Advanced Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Roar of the Wyrm]{Roar of the Wyrm}

You draw on the power of dragons, linnorms, and other powerful reptilian creatures.
name: Wyrmkin Domain
